Package com.brightcove.onceux.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ResettableListener
    Provide an interface to handle resetting an implementing instance to it's initial state.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeVideoEventHandler
    Provide a class to handle a new video, either because a previous video completed or a new video is about to start.
    OnceUxEventListener
    Provide a base class for all OnceUX event handlers.
    OnceUxEventType
    Identifies OnceUX event types used and emitted within the OnceUX plugin.
    ProgressEventHandler
    Provide a default private class to deal with PROGRESS events by capturing the current segment and handling any uncompleted seek operations.
    SendImpressionEventHandler
    Provide a class to send an event corresponding to a <Impression> element.
    SendTrackingBeaconEventHandler
    Provide a class to send out a tracking beacon as part of processing for the <Tracking> elements encountered in an ad break.
